chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
fixed_nodes: seq nid
this: nid
d: dstatelet
C: coh d
n: Equality.sort nat_eqType
v: dynamic id

Goal:
n \in fixed_nodes -> find counter (getLocal n d) = Some v -> dyn_tp v = nat

Premises:
find : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> cT -> option V
Notation coh := GreeterCoh
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Notation seq := list
counter = ptr_nat 1 : ptr
Module Equality := Struct Definition block : forall A : Type, A -> A. Parameter JMeq_eq_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), JMeq_eq JMeq_refl = erefl x. Parameter UIP_refl_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), UIP_refl A x (erefl x) = erefl (erefl x). Parameter inj_pairT2_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (P : A -> Type) (p : P x), inj_pairT2 A P x p p (erefl (existT P x p)) = erefl p. Record DependentEliminationPackage (A : Type) : Type := Build_DependentEliminationPackage { elim_type : Type; elim : elim_type } Definition elim_type
dynamic : forall A : Type, (A -> Type) -> Type
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
dyn_tp = fun A : Type => [eta projT1 (A:=A)] : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type), {x : A & P x} -> A Arguments dyn_tp {A}%type_scope {P}%function_scope
lcoh : forall n : nat_eqType, n \in fixed_nodes -> localCoh (getLocal n d)
greeter_coh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i fixed_nodes, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in fixed_nodes -> localCoh (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [fixed_nodes : seq nid this : nid d : dstatelet C : coh d n : nat_eqType v : dynamic id |- Type]
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
greet_safe = fun (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType) => [/\ this \in fixed_nodes, n \in fixed_nodes, exists m : nat, msg == m :: hello & coh d] : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq_eqType nat_eqType -> Prop
um_eta : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U), k \in dom f -> exists v : V, find k f = Some v /\ f = pts k v \+ free k f
find_some = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U) => (fun (_evar_0_ : forall e : find k f = None, (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = Some v -> b) false (dom_find_none' e)) (_evar_0_0 : forall (v0 : V) (e : find k f = Some v0) (e0 : f = upd k v0 (free k f)), (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = Some v -> b) true (dom_find_some' e e0)) => match dom_find k f as d in (dom_find_spec _ _ b) return ((fun b0 : bool => fun=> find k f = Some v -> b0) b d) with | dom_find_none' x => _evar_0_ x | @dom_find_some...
dom_find_some' : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) (v : V), find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true
findPtUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k v \+ f) -> find k (pts k v \+ f) = Some v
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
heap_eta : forall (x : ptr) (h : heap), x \in dom h -> exists (A : Type) (v : A), find x h = Some (idyn v) /\ h = x : -> v \+ free x h
findPtUn2 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k1 k2 : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k2 v \+ f) -> find k1 (pts k2 v \+ f) = (if k1 == k2 then Some v else find k1 f)
nodes = fun=> mem fixed_nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid
Variant dom_find_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) : bool -> Type := dom_find_none' : find k f = None -> dom_find_spec k f false | dom_find_some' : forall v : V, find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true Arguments dom_find_spec [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments dom_find_none' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f] Arguments dom_find_some' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f v]
heap_eta2 = fun (A : Type) (x : ptr) (h : heap) (v : A) (E : find x h = Some (idyn v)) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (x0 : Type) (p : (fun A0 : Type => exists v0 : A0, find x h = Some (idyn v0) /\ h = x :-> v0 \+ free x h) x0), (fun=> h = x :-> v \+ free x h) (ex_intro (fun A0 : Type => exists v0 : A0, find x h = Some (idyn v0) /\ h = x :-> v0 \+ free x h) x0 p) => match heap_eta (find_some E) as e return ((fun=> h = x :-> v \+ free x h) e) with | @ex_intro _ _ x0 x1 => _evar_0_ x0 x...
localCoh = Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | exists n : nat, h = counter : -> n] : Pred heap
find_none = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) => (fun (_evar_0_ : forall e : find k f = None, (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b) false (dom_find_none' e)) (_evar_0_0 : forall (v : V) (e : find k f = Some v) (e0 : f = upd k v (free k f)), (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b) true (dom_find_some' e e0)) => match dom_find k f as d in (dom_find_spec _ _ b) return ((fun b0 : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b0) b d) with | dom_find_none' x => _evar_0_ x | @dom_find_some' _ _ _ _ _ x x...
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
subnKC : forall m n : nat, m <= n -> m + (n - m) = n
iota = fix iota (m n : nat) {struct n} : seq nat := match n with | 0 => [::] | n'.+1 => m :: iota m.+1 n' end : nat -> nat -> seq nat Arguments iota (_ _)%nat_scope
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
bigop.index_iota = fun m n : nat => iota m (n - m) : nat -> nat -> seq nat Arguments bigop.index_iota (_ _)%nat_scope
domPtUnX : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (x : ptr) (i : union_map_classPCM heapUMC), valid (x :-> v \+ i) -> x \in dom (x :-> v \+ i)
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
leq = fun m n : nat => m - n == 0 : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments leq (_ _)%nat_scope
subSn : forall m n : nat, m <= n -> n.+1 - m = (n - m).+1

```coq
intros Hfind.
rewrite <- (lcoh n H).
simpl.
destruct (find counter (getLocal n d)) as [v|] eqn:Efind.
- inversion Hfind.
  subst v.
  auto.
- contradiction.
Qed.```

original: intros Hfind. rewrite <- (lcoh n H). simpl. destruct (find counter (getLocal n d)) as [v|] eqn:Efind. - inversion Hfind. subst v. auto. - contradiction.
